data.label: RenderScript Intrinsics Replacement Toolkit
data.description: 此工具包提供了一组高性能的图像处理功能，如模糊、混合和调整大小。它可以作为大多数已弃用的 RenderScript Intrinsics 函数的独立替代品使用。

data.label: RenderScript Intrinsics Replacement Toolkit
data.description: This Toolkit provides a collection of high-performance image manipulation functions like blur, blend, and resize. It can be used as a stand-alone replacement for most of the deprecated RenderScript Intrinsics functions.
